author: markt
msg: Use context error pages where possible e.g. for authenticator errors

author: pieber
msg: Security improvements. Split pages to number of items:
BasePage - for resource references and keeping same css/overall layout
SecuredPage - for authenticated users with admin role
SidebarPage - for pages with sub menu
SinglePage - for pages without submenu on left side

author: pieber
msg: Extend BundleActionsPanel to support start/stop/refresh/uninstall operations

author: pieber
msg: Languages stuff improvements - fixed missing flag for French translation and added translation resource for Karaf tab
